-and like a real gentleman, I chose dare. -[boy] Go, Ronnie!
Anyway, now, I will do you all the honor of showing you my business.
translation.ko: 이제 내 물건을 감상할 영광을 여러분에게 주겠다

translation.en: -Gross. -Ugh!
[boy] Call 911.
[girl] Oh, my God.
Bad break.
-It's a pool joke. -That's not funny.
It's the game.
-What? -It is. It followed us home.
Are you being serious right now?
Carter told me that it was real,
that we were all in and that it would find us.
We're really taking the word of our mentally unstable tour guide?
translation.ko: 그 꼴통 자식 말을 믿는 거야?

translation.en: How else do you explain what happened to me in the library, huh?
-And now Ronnie? -Oh, I don't know.
Maybe he was drunk, and he fell off a pool table, which is what happened.
So, it's just a coincidence that he was supposed to be doing a dare?
-Let's just calm down. -No!
Carter said, "Tell the truth, or you die. Do the dare, or you die."
translation.ko: 카터가 그랬어 ‘진실을 말 안 하거나 도전을 피하면 죽는다’

translation.en: Ronnie chickened out. He did not do his dare, and now he's dead.
Guys, tell me I'm not crazy!
translation.ko: 내가 미친 소리 하는 거 같아?

translation.en: [Lucas] No, you definitely sound crazy.
[Olivia] Lucas,
[exhales heavily] I am so sorry for what I said,
but I swear to you, something forced me to say that.
translation.ko: 근데 뭔가 날 그렇게 만든 거야

translation.en: And I need you to believe me.
Please.
Kind of hard to believe someone who's been lying to you for so long.
translation.ko: 날 여태껏 속인 널 어떻게 믿어?

translation.en: See you guys.
[Ronnie on video] Anyway, now, I will do you all the honor of showing you my business.
translation.ko: 내 물건을 감상할 영광을 여러분에게 주겠다

translation.en: [distorted voice] Lucas.
Lucas.
Lucas.
That's very funny, guys.
Okay, this is insane.
Hey.
I believe you.
Something started burning "truth or dare" into my arm.
translation.ko: 뭔가가 내 팔에 ‘진실 혹은 도전’을 새겼어

translation.en: Oh, my God, are you okay?
Yeah, yeah.
I mean... It's gone now,
but I felt it, Olivia. It was really painful.
Yeah. And when I was in the library, I was surrounded by people,
but what we're seeing is not real.
Only the consequences are.
Did you answer?
Lucas, you have to answer.
I've had feelings for Olivia since we met.
Sometimes, I wonder what it'd be like to be with her instead of... Markie.
I wonder what it'd be like to wake up next to her.
To kiss her.
But I know that can never happen.
Oh, God, please tell me you didn't hang up.
We have to convince everybody else.
I'm coming.
What is all this?
An intervention?
I always thought day-drinking Penelope would be first.
Thanks.
Thank you for coming.
I live here.
So, what is it all about?
The game.
We're still playing it in the same order we played in Mexico.
translation.ko: 멕시코에서와 같은 순서로 우리가 하고 있어

translation.en: Carter told us the truth. The game is real.
First, it was my turn. I got asked in the library, and it made me tell your secret. Then it was Ronnie's turn.
translation.ko: 나한텐 네 비밀을 말하게 만들었고, 로니는

translation.en: He didn't do his dare, and it killed him. Maybe you and Ronnie shouldn't have answered.
translation.ko: - 도전을 피하자 죽였지 - 게임에 응한 게 실수 아냐?

translation.en: Carter also said, "Refuse to play, and you die."
I got asked tonight, and I tried to ignore it.
But then something burned "truth or dare" on my arm, Markie.
Show me.
It's gone now, but...
There's nothing there.
Because I told the truth.
-[Tyson] Oh, my... Jeez. -Wow, Olivia.
I mean, this is next-level.
You can't take responsibility for humiliating me in front of everyone
translation.ko: 날 망신 주고 루커스와 쫑낸 책임을

translation.en: and ruining my relationship,
so you come up with some insane story that a game made you say it?
Then you get Lucas to lie for you? No, I'm done.
Markie. Markie! Stop!
You can't be alone.
Why not?
Because in the picture, your turn is next.
Unknown number. Of course it is.
"Truth or dare?"
Wow. A text, really? I mean, there's no way a human could've sent this out.
Just answer it.
Fine.
Dare.
"Dare you to follow through with your promise.
Break Olivia's hand."
Obviously, this was you.
Do you see me texting you right now?
No, but you were the only one there when I said that.
translation.ko: 아니, 근데 그 말은 너만 들었잖아

translation.en: Markie, why would I dare you
translation.ko: 왜 내가 내 팔을 부러뜨리라고 해?

translation.en: -to break my own hand? -I don't know!
translation.ko: 왜 내가 내 팔을 부러뜨리라고 해? 모르지!

translation.en: Maybe you're making a new YouTube video on how to lose friends.
That seems even less likely.
[Markie] What are you doing?
You have to do it.
What?
You have to.
Ronnie didn't do his dare, and now he's dead.
Liv, this is so messed up.
Even by my standards.
Look, as pissed as I am at you right now, and I'm so pissed,
there's no way I'm gonna break your hand.
Well, you don't really have a choice.
[breath trembling] So just take it. Please.
Markie, I don't wanna find out what happens if you don't.
translation.ko: 안 하면 끔찍한 일이 생길 거야

translation.en: [exhales heavily] Just do it.
No. I can't.
God, just trust me, Markie. Do it. Please.
translation.ko: 그냥 날 믿고 해, 마키 제발!

translation.en: Don't tell me you're a fucking coward like your dad!
Oh, my God.
-[Olivia whimpering] -I'll get some ice.
I can't deal with this crazy right now. I got a med school interview tomorrow.
translation.ko: 난 못 보겠다 내일 의대 면접도 있어

translation.en: See a doctor!
-I'm sorry! Sorry! -Guys!
-[Olivia] Oh, God. -We gotta go to the hospital, okay? -Come on. -Okay.
[Brad] You believe all this?
I don't know what to believe.
Come on.
Come on.
[distorted voice] Brad...
Truth or dare?
Brad...
-[screaming] -Truth!
[Officer Chang] Brad?
Hey. What are you doing here?
Uh, my job. Why are you here?
translation.ko: 일 때문에 왔지, 넌 왜 왔니?

translation.en: Friend of mine got hurt. It's nothing serious. I'm just here for moral support.
translation.ko: 친구가 좀 다쳐서 옆에 같이 있어 주려고요

translation.en: [Officer Chang] Something wrong?
Yeah, no, I'm just a little shaken up.
You haven't come by to see your mother in a few weeks.
translation.ko: 너 집에 안 온 지 몇 주 됐어

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I'm sorry.
I thought I was paying for this school so you could come home every once in a while.
translation.ko: 가끔 집에 오라고 이 학교 보낸 거야

translation.en: I know. I know. I just...
Things have been a little crazy lately.
You know, I don't wanna hear excuses, son.
[in distorted voice] I want the truth.
There goes another $1,000 in credit card debt.
Oh, my God, Liv.
I just had my turn.
What?
The game, it made me, uh... It made me come out to my father.
What... Are you okay?
Yeah. Yeah. Yeah.
For the first time in my life, I told him my truth,
and I stood up to him and I feel... I feel awesome.
Okay, hold on. Your dad didn't know that you were gay?
Your ringtone's Beyoncé.
Everyone loves Beyoncé.
Tyson's next.
[secretary] Will do.
Tyson Curran?
Let's do this.
Right this way.
So you come from a family of doctors, then?
Yes, ma'am. Mother, father, sister, uncle, and grandfather.
translation.ko: 네, 어머니, 아버지, 누나 삼촌, 할아버지

translation.en: Pretty much everybody.
[chuckles] Well, they must have set a great example for you to want to take the same route.
translation.ko: 이 길을 선택하는 데 가족의 영향이 컸나 봐요

translation.en: Yes, absolutely, Dean Spencer.
Growing up, I would hear their stories about saving lives,
and I think... I think that somehow shaped me.
Pen! Where's Tyson?
His med school interview. Why?
You know,
I could do something self-serving, like become a hedge fund manager.
translation.ko: 펀드 매니저같이 돈 많이 버는 직업을 택할 수도 있겠지만

translation.en: The thing is, people need help, especially in times like these.
translation.ko: 이렇게 힘든 시기엔 사회를 위해 봉사해야죠

translation.en: That's very noble of you.
You know, I just have one final question.
He hasn't had his turn yet.
Mr. Curran, your bag.
Wait, Tyson, no! Wait, Tyson!
Can I help you?
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare?
I'm sorry. I beg your pardon?
Truth or dare?
Truth, I guess.
Did my friends really put you up to this?
How long have you been forging prescriptions?
I don't.
Did she actually tell you that?
[in normal voice] Excuse me?
I don't forge prescriptions. Why would you even ask me that?
translation.ko: 전 처방전 위조한 적 없어요 왜 그런 걸 묻죠?

translation.en: [all] Ty! Ty!
[Olivia] Ty! Open the door!
Tyson?
-Tyson! -Are you okay?
-[Olivia] Open the door! -[Brad] Ty!
What are you doing?
Oh! Oh, my God! [screaming]
Oh, my God! Oh, my God! My God!
Tyson lied and then died because of it.
Just like Ronnie did when he didn't do the dare.
And my turn's next.
Yeah, pick truth.
I mean, listen, we all should. Right?
Then whatever question that we get asked, we just answer it with 100% honesty.
translation.ko: 그리고 무조건 정직한 대답을 해야 해

translation.en: Okay, that's how we're gonna survive till we figure this out.
translation.ko: 그래야 살 수 있어 해결책을 찾을 때까지…

translation.en: We got it?
Only choose truth.
We need more vodka.
You need sleep.
Okay, I'll put her in bed.
You guys find Carter.
He started all this. Maybe he can end it.
He said that he went to USC.
Five Carters, none of them our guy.
Maybe he meant the other USC?
All right, she's asleep. Did you find Carter yet?
No, dead end.
Did you try using Google?
Search "Mexico truth or dare."
Uh, guys?
"Suspect Giselle Hammond, 22, an American college student
had gone missing while on spring break in Rosarito Beach.
The clerk recounted Hammond's bizarre behavior before the incident,
which is backed up with surveillance footage."
[Giselle] Pack of Morley's.
[Giselle] I don't wanna play anymore.
Dare.
[Giselle] I'm sorry. I don't have a choice.
-Holy shit. -[woman screaming]
[Lucas] Did they catch her?
Uh... No, it says there's still an ongoing search.
I just found her on Facebook.
What?
Oh, my God. It's him.
[Brad] Is he tagged?
No, I don't see him in any other photos.
Look at her wall. Maybe he posted.
[Olivia] Not that I see, but there's a bunch of posts
about people asking her to turn herself in. Stuff like that.
Wait. Do you think she's checking this?
-DM her. -Wait.
Just, uh, make a fake account. We don't want this shit traced to us.
translation.ko: 가짜 계정을 만들어 추적 못 하게

translation.en: Yeah.
So we're here on our first vacation together.
Is it our first vacation together?
[Penelope] Um, there was that time you came and visited me and my family in Texas. Right?
translation.ko: 자기가 텍사스 우리 집에 놀러 온 적은 있지만…

translation.en: [Tyson] You're from Texas? I thought you're from Mexico.
[Penelope laughs] From Mexico?
Tyson!
We're playing the game, too.
We need your help.
Please meet me.
This woman is wanted for murder.
Do you really think she's gonna come out of hiding for "We need your help"?
translation.ko: 도움을 청한다고 나타나 줄 거 같아?

translation.en: I know the game dared you to set that woman on fire.
Tell me where to meet you,
or I'll wait outside your family's house
until the game dares me to do the same to them.
Markie, you cannot send that!
If you want to live, you need to stop thinking about other people
translation.ko: 살고 싶으면 딴 사람 걱정 말고

translation.en: and start thinking about yourself!
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, beautiful?
What?
Hard to make a decision without Tyson telling you what to do?
translation.ko: 타이슨 없인 그런 것도 결정 못 해?

translation.en: Screw you!
Truth.
Truth or dare?
I said truth!
Sorry, that's not how this game works.
translation.ko: 미안하지만 이 게임은 그렇게 하는 게 아냐

translation.en: What the hell is that supposed to mean?
[Lucas] Be patient. She'll write back.
This is all my fault.
Hey, no, it's not.
No, she's right.
None of us wanted to follow that creep.
None of us wanted to play that stupid game.
The only reason I went on that trip was for you, remember?
translation.ko: 내가 멕시코에 간 건 널 위해서였어, 잊었어?

translation.en: You said you needed your best friend.
-All right, come on, guys. -No, but now I realize
it's not about friendship or "I choose you."
It's about me being there to cover your ass while you hooked up with randoms!
Hey.
Screw you, Olivia.
Was that necessary?
Guys, come outside! Now!
[Olivia] Pen! What are you doing?
I tried. It wouldn't let me pick truth. I tried, I swear!
translation.ko: 난 잘해보려고 했는데 진실을 선택 못 한대!

translation.en: I have to walk the edge until I finish this!
translation.ko: 이걸 다 마실 때까지 여길 걸으래!

translation.en: [Olivia] Pen, you're gonna be fine!
Okay, just go slow. Take your time.
-[Markie] Be careful! -[Lucas] Oh, jeez!
I'm gonna go up there. I'll try and grab her if she loses her balance.
No, your hand's broken. I'll go.
Pen, just walk slowly, okay?
Hey! Just take your time, okay?
-Walk slowly. It's gonna be fine. -[Brad] What do we do?
[Olivia] Be careful. It's gonna be okay.
-Okay. -[Brad] You're gonna be okay.
We need to grab something in case she falls. Go inside.
I'm gonna clear a path.
[Brad] All right, let's go! Let's go!
-[yelps] -[Olivia] Pen!
Be careful!
You're good, okay?
[Markie] Hey, will this work?
What? Yeah. Yeah. Come on.
Just get under her. Get under her and follow her.
-[Brad] Be careful, Pen. -[gasps]
[Markie] Go! Get back. Get back. Get back.
[Olivia] No need to rush.
[Olivia] It's okay. [Markie] It's okay, Pen.
[Olivia] Just take your time. Take it slowly.
[Olivia] Okay, just put one foot in front of the other.
[Olivia] Watch it, okay? Just go slow.
You can do this.
We're right here. We're here for you, okay?
I see her. She's right there. Go, go, go!
Wait. She's on the corner.
[Brad] There she is.
Get that stuff out of the way!
[Lucas] Hey! Pen!
I'm coming! I'm coming!
No, no, no, don't get too close!
If I cheat, if I don't do the dare--
I know. I know. Okay?
But when you finish, I'll be here to grab you.
Just gotta go around this corner now, okay?
[Penelope] Okay.
Take your time, okay?
You're doing great, Pen. Don't look down.
-Stay here. Stay below her. -Okay.
Wait. Where are you going?
Hey, Pen, don't look at the fence. Okay?
Look at me, okay? You're almost there. Just a little more.
translation.ko: 날 봐, 거의 다 왔어 조금만 더…

translation.en: She's right above us. Throw it on top.
-You ready? -Yeah.
That's not gonna work.
That might.
-[Olivia grunts] -Oh! Hey! Penelope!
Shit.
-Guys, get back further. Get back! -Go, go, go.
translation.ko: - 더 뒤로 가, 뒤로! - 빨리 와

translation.en: One last sip.
[Lucas] No. Pen!
Hey! Pen! No! No!
-[Olivia] Pen! -[Markie] She's not moving. [panting]
Pen.
Is this my bed?
-You're okay. -[cell phone vibrating]
I just got a Facebook message from Giselle.
We're sure this is a good idea, meeting her here?
What if the cops trace her message?
No, she wrote us on a fake account.
Yeah, but that chick lit somebody on fire. She's probably nuts.
translation.ko: 사람을 태워 죽인 여자야 싸이코일 거야

translation.en: [Markie] I mean, do we really have another choice?
We can talk about this inside. Come on.
Let's go.
Inside?
Okay, all right, that's far enough. Tell us what's happening.
Which one of you's Olivia?
No, you answer our question first. How do you know Carter?
-Carter? -Cut the crap. We saw the photo.
translation.ko: - 카터? - 시침 떼지 마, 사진 봤어

translation.en: He's the one who brought us into this game.
Yeah, right, okay. Carter, right.
Did he bring you into this, too?
No, he didn't. He didn't start this. He was just one of my friends.
translation.ko: 걔가 시작한 게 아냐 걘 그냥 친구야

translation.en: We all went on a trip to Mexico and got really wasted.
We found this old church, and we decided to party in it,
and my roommate wanted to play truth or dare, so we did.
But when we got home, the game, it just kept going.
My roommate died first, and then the other ones and--
How is this possible?
I wish I knew. I thought this was some kind of karmic payback for Sam trashing the place, you know?
translation.ko: 어쩌면 죗값일지도 몰라 샘이 거길 난장판으로 만든…

translation.en: "Sam"?
Uh, yeah, Sam. He was one of my friends.
He got really drunk, and he just started breaking stuff.
I don't know. We were all being idiots. I don't...
Our friend just had a turn in the game. It wouldn't let her pick truth. Do you know why?
translation.ko: ‘진실’을 선택 못 하게 할 때도 있던데 왜지?

translation.en: It's how we played. We called it "two truths and a dare."
translation.ko: 우리가 만든 규칙이야 두 명이 계속

translation.en: If two people pick truth in a row, then the next person had to do a dare.
Thought it was more fun that way.
More fun?
Your asshole buddy gave us a death sentence.
Any more super dangerous rules you wanna tell us about?
Easy, Pen.
He told me he was dared to find a new group to play.
And that it had to be at the mission. He didn't have a choice, you know?
translation.ko: 수도원에 데려가라고… 걔도 딴 선택이 없었지

translation.en: Of course he did.
Okay, so where is Carter now?
I haven't talked to him since he went back to Mexico. I thought that when he got a new group to play, that we would be out.
translation.ko: 멕시코 간 뒤 소식이 없어 새 팀 모으면 끝날 줄 알았는데

translation.en: I can't believe he only got five of you to play. If he would've gotten more,
then I would've had a longer time before I had to go again.
translation.ko: 내 순서가 더 뒤에 왔을 거야

translation.en: You got another turn?
Okay. It's time to go, guys.
Is this why you're telling us the truth?
No. I, uh... I picked dare.
Markie's right. Let's get out of here.
Okay, we're leaving. Come on, Olivia.
I am so sorry, Olivia.
How did you know my name when I got here?
I didn't put it in the message.
-No! -[Olivia screams]
-[Lucas] No! -[Markie] Pen!
Brad! No! No!
-Hold her down! -I have to kill Olivia!
translation.ko: - 꽉 잡아! - 난 쟬 죽여야 해!

translation.en: [Lucas] Stop moving.
[Brad] What the...
[Lucas] No! No!
No, no!
[Brad] Oh, shit.
What was she thinking?
It wasn't her.
Something took over like she was possessed.
She didn't finish her dare.
Like Ronnie. This is what happens.
So what do we do?
We tell the truth.
[Olivia] She was erratic, said she had to kill me.
translation.ko: 걔가 절 죽여야 한다면서 총으로 쏘려 했어요 “크라니스 형사”

translation.en: Then Penelope pushed me out of the way.
She shot her and then turned the gun on herself.
Were you aware that Giselle Hammond was wanted for murder?
translation.ko: 살인혐의로 수배 중인 건 알고 있었나?

translation.en: Yes.
Yeah, we thought that she knew someone that we were looking for.
A guy that we met in Mexico, his name was Carter.
You don't know his last name?
No.
Any of these people look like him?
No, who are they?
Five of Giselle Hammond's friends.
All deceased.
Three suicides, two accidental deaths. All in three weeks.
translation.ko: 셋은 자살, 둘은 사고로 다 3주 동안

translation.en: And now you've lost two friends.
I don't believe in coincidences, Olivia.
I think this is all connected. If you know how, you need to tell me.
translation.ko: 서로 다 관련이 있을 거야 아는 걸 말해줘

translation.en: No, I promise.
If I did know, I would.
I hope so.
We'll be in touch.
Don't take any more vacations.
That did not go well.
[Lucas] We told them the truth.
-As much as we could. -Guys, the cops should be the least of our concerns.
translation.ko: - 최대한! - 경찰을 신경 쓸 때가 아냐

translation.en: I mean, Penelope's dead, and Giselle gave us nothing.
translation.ko: 페넬로페는 죽었고 지젤한텐 알아낸 게 없어

translation.en: She did say a new game had to start at the mission.
That place has to be the key.
[Officer Chang] Brad.
[sighs] Catch up with you guys later.
No, we shouldn't split up.
No, it's okay. My turn's not for a while.
I'll deal with my father. You deal with finding the mission.
Come on.
I think it was built in 1896.
Yeah, that really narrows it down.
It's a start.
Oh, shit. I gotta grab my charger.
I think you left your bag in my room.
-Oh, my God. -What?
Check this out.
It says there was a massacre a few weeks later.
translation.ko: 그 몇 주 뒤 집단 살육이 있었대

translation.en: "Only one survivor lives in the area. Inez Reyes, 19."
translation.ko: ‘19세의 이네스 레예스가 이곳에 사는 유일한 생존자다’

translation.en: [in distorted voice] Truth or dare.
Where is she? Liv!
Hey! Hey!
Where am I?
-Where am I? -What the hell are you...
Hey! Hey! Hey!
Are you okay?
Was that your turn?
[Lucas] Hey! Hey! Come back! Come back!
Olivia, what did he say?
He dared me to sleep with Lucas.
Why would you pick dare?
Because of what Giselle said.
If I picked truth,
I was just forcing someone else to pick dare.
translation.ko: 딴 사람이 도전을 택할 수밖에 없잖아

translation.en: How noble.
Markie, I didn't know that's what it would ask.
I don't think he knew where he was.
-Are you guys okay? -Yeah, I'm perfect.
Well, hey, hey! Where are you going?
Anywhere but here.
What is going on?
Why don't you ask Olivia?
Will you please tell me what the hell is going on?
I got my turn.
Yeah, and?
Whoa. Hey, no. What are we doing?
Oh, this is the dare.
I'm sorry.
Why didn't you pick truth?
I told Markie it was so that you guys wouldn't have to,
but that was a lie.
I chose dare because there is something that I can never tell Markie, and I'm really afraid the game's gonna make me do it.
translation.ko: 걔한테 해선 안 될 얘길 해야 할까 봐 겁났어

translation.en: It can't be that bad.
You have no idea.
-[grunts] -What?
No, you're just doing this because of the dare. Because you have to.
translation.ko: 넌 게임 때문에 어쩔 수 없이 하는 거잖아

translation.en: No, you have to.
I don't.
[in distorted voice] Look at me.
Truth or dare?
Truth or dare?
[choking] Truth!
Who are you truly in love with?
I care about you. I do.
I'm in love with Markie.
Liv, I'm sorry. It was the game.
No, it was the truth.
[Markie on video] Roy Cameron, 45 years old, attempts to make dinner.
Take one.
Whoa. A little faith, please?
Nobody makes a steak like your old man.
translation.ko: 나만큼 스테이크 잘 굽는 사람 없어

translation.en: [Markie] Wait. Dad, I'm pescatarian now.
I know, honey.
Dad?
I miss you so much.
I miss you, too.
There's something that I've been dying to ask you.
translation.ko: 너한테 꼭 묻고 싶은 게 있었어

translation.en: No.
-She's not answering. -[Lucas] Wait.
Come here. Look at this.
There's no number, but she lives in Tijuana. That's less than three hours away.
translation.ko: 번호는 없지만, 이 여자 3시간 거리 티후아나에 살아

translation.en: Who is she?
She's someone who might be able to help us.
Come on.
[Roy in distorted voice] Come on, sweetheart.
Time to pick.
Truth.
The gun I used to kill myself,
why do you keep it?
Sometimes, I think about using it.
Maybe you should get it.
[Lucas] I'm worried about Markie.
I wish we would have found her before we left.
Well, she doesn't want to speak to me right now, so there's nothing we can do.
translation.ko: 나랑 말도 안 하는데 찾는다고 어쩌겠어?

translation.en: You know that secret that you're keeping from her?
Maybe if you got it out, the game couldn't use it against you.
translation.ko: 게임이 그걸 이용 못 할지도 몰라

translation.en: No, no one can ever know.
Especially not Markie. It would kill her.
translation.ko: 사실을 알면 마키는 못 견딜 거야

translation.en: I'll try her again when we get there.
-Um... -[in English] Can I help you?
Sorry. Um, we're looking for Inez Reyes.
She's my grandmother. I watch after her.
We were just wondering if we could speak to her.
translation.ko: 그분과 얘길 좀 나눌 수 있을까요?

translation.en: She speaks to no one.
No, please.
Our friends are dying, just like hers did. We just need a few words.
translation.ko: 우리 친구들이 죽어가고 있어요 몇 마디면 돼요

translation.en: I will ask.
And if you could show her this.
Show her that we were at this mission
and that half the people in this photo are now dead.
translation.ko: 이 사진 속 절반이 죽었다고 전해줘요

translation.en: Then maybe she'll talk to us.
She might see you. But she will not speak to you.
translation.ko: 만나줄진 몰라도 얘긴 안 하실 거예요

translation.en: She has not said a word in 50 years.
Wait here.
She must have taken a vow of silence, right?
She was 19 when her friends were butchered. Imagine what that did to her.
translation.ko: 19살 때 친구들이 살육당했어 그 심정을 상상해봐

translation.en: I don't have to.
It's been over an hour.
Yeah, for someone who doesn't speak, they seem to be doing a lot of talking.
translation.ko: 말 안 한다더니 할 말이 많나 보네

translation.en: She will see you.
I'm sorry for the wait.
She has written something for you.
What is it?
[girl] She would not let me read it.
[in English] Thank you for seeing us, Ms. Reyes.
"The mission was a convent where young women went to find God.
translation.ko: ‘그곳엔 수녀 수업을 받는 어린 소녀들이 있었지’

translation.en: We were girls, so we played silly games like hide-and-seek.
But the priest who ran the convent forced us to play his own game.
He let us hide, but then he took the one he found.
His pleasure was our pain.
We suffered in silence.
Then one of the girls told a secret.
She knew spells that could call spirits,
so she summoned a demon named Calux.
He possessed our game."
Possessed the game?
"Demons possess people, places,
objects, even ideas."
"Calux is a trickster.
That night, when the priest found his victim,
she was possessed by Calux.
She hid the priest's body in the mission
in pieces.
It took them a week to find his head.
But Calux didn't want to stop. He made us keep playing.
Many of my sisters died."
Wait. How did you and the others escape?
"The person who released the demon
can trap it with a simple ritual.
But only by his own hand."
Uh... This is the spell?
It's in Spanish.
"The spell must be repeated seven times,
and a sacrifice must be placed in a pot sealed with wax.
As long as the pot stays sealed in the mission,
the door we opened for Calux will also be sealed."
translation.ko: ‘우리가 연 캘룩스의 문도 봉인될 수 있어’

translation.en: Wait. I've seen that pot before.
[gasps] Yeah.
Look. When I saw it, it was broken,
and there was something inside it, and it smelled rotten.
"Whoever broke the pot will have to do the same."
translation.ko: ‘항아릴 깨뜨린 사람도 똑같은 걸 바쳐야 해’

translation.en: What was it?
The sacrifice?
It was you who summoned the demon?
It's been a few years since AP Spanish, but I think it says,
"I have called upon an evil.
Silence my voice so the evil is no more."
So when Carter and his friends broke the pot at the mission--
The demon was freed and possessed their game of truth or dare.
translation.ko: 악령이 풀려나 그 게임에 씐 거야

translation.en: And we have to find whoever broke that pot.
Giselle said somebody named Sam trashed the place.
Yeah, and we have no idea who Sam is.
Or if he's even still alive.
And if we do find him...
What? "Hi, Sam, do you mind cutting out your tongue
and sealing it in this lovely handmade pot?"
translation.ko: ‘이 예쁜 항아리에 넣고 봉인 좀 할게’

translation.en: I'll check Giselle's Facebook again, see if there's a Sam tagged.
translation.ko: 샘이 지젤 페이스북에 태그돼 있나 볼게

translation.en: Still nothing from Markie?
She's ignoring all my texts.
Her turn is next. I'm gonna try calling her again.
[Officer Chang] Brad?
-Brad! It's your father. -[sighs]
Since Penelope, he's been...
I'll get rid of him.
Let's talk outside.
[Officer] I'm gonna grab a coffee.
Look, uh, I'm hearing some things about your friend's murder.
translation.ko: 강력반 크라니스 말로는 네 친구의 피살사건이

translation.en: Kranis in homicide isn't convinced it's so simple.
I know I don't need to ask this, but...
Is there something you're not telling us?
No, I promise. Everything we told you was true.
Markie, thank God!
Why are you telling me all this?
'Cause I know Kranis is wrong,
and I want you to know what's going on.
Look, you don't have to worry.
I'm not gonna let anything happen to you.
You're still my son, Brad.
You gonna get that?
Get what?
[voice on radio] Truth or dare, Brad?
[Markie] Yeah, I guess I just needed some time alone.
No, no, no. It's fine.
Just get here as fast as you can. And please be careful. Your turn's next.
translation.ko: 빨리 와, 조심하고! 다음이 네 순서야

translation.en: I had my turn.
I chose truth.
So did Lucas.
And if the both of you picked truth...
[voice] You only have one choice.
You sure there's nothing you didn't tell me?
I dare you to steal his gun
and make him beg for his life.
Son?
Thank you, Dad,
for everything.
It's just, uh...
There's just one more thing I need to do, and I hope you can forgive me.
Yeah. Yeah, yeah. Of course.
For what?
It's okay.
I need you to beg.
-For your life. -The hell are you doing?
[Brad] Beg for your life!
Brad, please put the gun down!
-Just do as I say... -You don't have to do this. ...or I'll die. Get on your knees.
translation.ko: 안 그러면 내가 죽어요 무릎 꿇어요

translation.en: We have to go. Now!
Do as I say. I'll explain everything, okay?
-I know I've been hard on you. I'm sorry. -Listen. No!
That's not what this is about.
Beg! Please, I'll explain everything. Just beg.
I guess you think I deserve this. No! No.
Just beg!
Please! Just beg, and I'll put down the gun.
-What's that gonna prove, Brad? -Just beg! And I'll put down the gun! -Beg-- -[gun fires]
translation.ko: - 뭘 확인하려고 이래? - 일단 비세요, 그럼…

translation.en: No, no! No!
[Olivia] Brad!
Brad, no, no, no. No!
[Olivia] No! No!
Get a paramedic.
Come on.
Brad! Brad! No, no, no.
Stay here. You're gonna be fine.
No! No!
I need a paramedic. Help!
I need a paramedic! Brad!
[Markie] I'm so sorry.
Guys, can we get out of here?
I still need to talk to the detective.
-I shouldn't have picked truth. -[Lucas] No.
It's not your fault. I picked truth, too.
translation.ko: 네 잘못 아냐 나도 진실을 택했어

translation.en: We shouldn't have left Brad alone.
No, it wouldn't have mattered.
This game is smart. It's too smart. We're not playing it.
translation.ko: 그 게임은 똑똑해 우릴 갖고 놀고 있다고

translation.en: It's playing us. And none of this is a coincidence.
translation.ko: 그 게임은 똑똑해 우릴 갖고 놀고 있다고 모든 게 계획적이야

translation.en: It waits for our most vulnerable moments, and that's when it asks us.
translation.ko: 우리가 약점에 노출될 때 질문을 하지

translation.en: [in distorted voice] Yeah, you got that right, Olivia.
And now it's your turn.
Truth or dare?
What?
What is it?
Lucas just asked me.
[in normal voice] No, I didn't. [in distorted voice] Truth or dare, Olivia?
[Markie] Okay.
Okay, you have to pick truth.
Olivia, do it.
-Dare. -[Markie] Olivia.
I dare you
to tell Markie the secret you fear most.
What? What is it making you do?
Markie, there's something important I need to tell you.
[whispers] What?
I was there the night your dad died. I know what happened.
translation.ko: 네 아빠 돌아가신 날 나 거기 있었어

translation.en: What?
What are you talking about?
I had gotten into a fight with my parents, so I went to your house.
translation.ko: 그날 부모님과 싸우고 너희 집에 갔었어

translation.en: You weren't there, so your dad let me in.
translation.ko: 넌 없었고, 너희 아빠가 들어오라고 하더라

translation.en: He was drinking, and he offered me one, so I took it.
translation.ko: 술 마시고 계셨는데 한 잔 주길래 받았지

translation.en: We had a few, and then he told me that he had been fired that day
translation.ko: 몇 잔 마신 뒤 그날 해고됐다고 하더라

translation.en: 'cause he was drinking on the job.
And I just... I felt really bad for him. [sniffles]
But I told him that you and I would help him figure things out.
translation.ko: 도와드릴 방법을 너와 함께 찾아보겠다고 했지

translation.en: And then he called me beautiful.
I was drunk, and I didn't know what to do, and then he leaned in to kiss me...
I tried to push him off. I didn't do it, but he...
[sniffles] He kept coming back stronger.
Finally, I got free.
He begged me to forgive him,
said that he needed help, but I was so scared, and I was confused.
translation.ko: 자긴 정상이 아니라고… 난 두렵고 혼란스러웠어

translation.en: And I threatened to tell you what happened,
but he said that he would die if you ever found out.
I told him that you'd be better off if he were dead.
translation.ko: 그래서 차라리 죽는 게 널 위한 거라고 했어

translation.en: Markie, I am so sorry.
I wanted to tell you, but by the time I got a hold of you,
translation.ko: 말하려 했는데 너와 통화가 됐을 땐

translation.en: he had already done it, and you were devastated.
It broke my heart. I didn't know what to do. Trust me. I--
translation.ko: 아무 말도 할 수가 없었어 믿어줘

translation.en: No.
No, I'll never trust you again.
Markie.
Don't!
Don't.
[Kranis] Miss Barron,
you're up.
[Kranis] "I know the game dared you to set that woman on fire.
Tell me where to meet you, or I'll wait outside your family's house
translation.ko: ‘약속 장소 정해, 안 그러면 네 부모 집 밖에서 기다릴 거야’

translation.en: until the game dares me to do the same to them."
That is quite a threat.
We traced the IP to your laptop.
[stammers] I know that that looks bad,
but I just needed to get her attention.
Yeah, I know you're playing some kind of truth or dare game,
but what I don't understand is, why are people dying?
There's only four of you left.
I'd like to keep the rest of you guys alive.
Four?
Everyone who's dead was in Mexico.
That leaves you, Markie and Lucas, and Giselle's friend, Sam Meehan.
translation.ko: 자네, 마키, 루커스와 지젤 친구 샘 미핸만 남았어

translation.en: Sam?
Wait. He's alive?
You know him?
No.
No. [stammering]
That's just someone that Giselle had mentioned.
He's holed up in an apartment. Won't talk to anybody.
Said I had to arrest him if I wanted to speak to him again.
translation.ko: 다시 갈 땐 체포영장을 갖고 간다고 했어

translation.en: Olivia, what the hell is happening here?
translation.ko: 올리비아 무슨 일이 일어나고 있는 거야?

translation.en: Could I get some water, please?
Thanks.
[Kranis] Officer, I need a glass of water.
-[camera clicks] -[woman] Yes, sir, right away.
Am I being charged?
Not yet.
Okay. Then I need to go.
Carter is Sam.
He was using a fake name.
But Giselle acted like they were different people?
Well, she was probably trying to protect him, but she slipped up, and she used his real name. Come on.
translation.ko: 걜 보호하려 한 건데 실수로 본명을 흘린 거지

translation.en: Markie?
Markie?
Markie!
Markie, please open the door. We need to talk.
translation.ko: 마키, 문 열어봐, 할 말이 있어

translation.en: What are you doing?
What my father did.
Markie, please put it down.
[sobs] Why?
I don't have anything.
You have me.
No.
-No, the game has us. -[cocks gun]
I hid the truth about your dad to protect you.
translation.ko: 그 얘길 숨긴 건 널 지키기 위해서였어

translation.en: But I was wrong.
Every single day, I wish I could take back what I said to him.
translation.ko: 매일 후회해 네 아빠한테 그 말 한 걸…

translation.en: He tried before.
It's not your fault.
We can't change the past.
But we can still have a future. We can end this game.
translation.ko: 미래는 바꿀 수 있어 이 게임 끝낼 수 있어

translation.en: How?
Carter. I know where he is.
Okay, so what's the plan?
We just have to get him back to the mission.
Okay, so don't open with, "We need you to cut out your own tongue"?
translation.ko: 대뜸 ‘네 혀를 자르자’는 말부터 하진 마

translation.en: Here it is. Six.
[Carter] Go away! I don't wanna talk to anyone.
Screw this.
-You... -[Olivia] Carter!
Or is it Sam?
-How did you find me? -We were motivated.
translation.ko: - 날 어떻게 찾았어? - 우리도 살아야 하니까!

translation.en: -What the hell happened in here? -The game.
translation.ko: - 여기서 뭐 하는 거야? - 그 게임도

translation.en: No contact with the outside.
Nothing in here can hurt me.
This is your plan?
My plan is to wait it out.
No, that was your second plan.
Your first plan was to screw us.
Three of my best friends are dead because of you!
translation.ko: 내 친구 셋이 너 때문에 죽었어!

translation.en: I'm sorry. I lost friends, too, okay?
If I could take it all back, I would.
There is a way.
But we all have to go back to the mission.
A way to what? To what, end the game? How?
Just trust me.
We have to go back.
Uh-uh...
No, this is another dare, right?
The game is daring you to lure me out.
-Is that-- -No.
She's telling the truth.
And why should I trust you?
Because we want the same thing.
We wanna survive.
I'm gonna tell you what you should have told me at the bar.
translation.ko: 그날 네가 해야 했을 말을 대신해주지

translation.en: Piss off.
Okay, sweet, little Olivia's not shooting anyone.
Try me. I dare you.
[Lucas] Come on. Let's go.
Is this ritual that old nun told you about actually gonna work?
[Olivia] There's only one way to find out.
So we're gonna end this with a seance?
[Olivia] We are not ending it.
You are.
Me?
I tried.
[chuckles] We all know how that turned out.
-Stay down. -[coughs]
Here, take this. Take it.
Say it seven times.
What are you gonna do with that?
I'm giving it to you.
Take it now!
Now say the words seven times.
Go!
Did you feel that?
[Olivia] Don't stop.
-Just tell me what's going on! -Keep going!
[Carter] All right. Uh, uh...
Say it again.
Five more times.
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, Lucas?
Dare.
-Where are you going? -Just gotta get away from here.
Wait, wait, wait!
You can't go. Your turn's next.
I just had my turn.
-Gotta get away from you both. -Why?
Because it dared me to choose.
You already have. You love Markie!
Choose which one of you to kill.
Luke.
What, so he's just leaving?
Don't stop. Two more times.
[Markie] Luke!
Luke!
Why did you pick dare?
Because I knew if I didn't, then one of you would have to.
translation.ko: 내가 안 하면 너희 중 하나가 해야 해

translation.en: And we're so close.
And I won't let the game kill you.
You're such an idiot.
What can I say?
You do that to me.
That's seven. We gotta get out of here. This place is coming down.
No, there's one more thing to do.
Pick up the knife.
I can't do it for you.
Pick it up!
And do what?
I'm so sorry, Sam.
But you unleashed this evil, which means you're the only one who can stop it.
translation.ko: 악령을 네가 불러냈으니 네가 가둬야 해

translation.en: I need you to cut out your tongue.
No! That's insane.
Please! It's the only way we survive.
You take care of each other.
No!
No. No, no, no.
No, no!
[Olivia] Do it.
Lucas, stop!
That's not Lucas.
Do it now, Carter!
-[rumbling] -Before it's too late.
Don't you wanna live?
You do not have a choice! Do it!
I can't believe I'm about to do this.
[in distorted voice] I will murder everyone you've ever known.
No! They are not in this. It's just us!
You're right. But Lucas is.
And he didn't do his dare.
So now he dies.
Lucas refused his dare to save us.
We have to finish this.
[Markie] Calux killed Carter. The spell won't work.
translation.ko: 카터가 죽어서 주문이 안 통할 거야

translation.en: No, we lost the second we started this game.
translation.ko: 게임을 시작한 순간 우린 이미 진 거야

translation.en: The second we came here.
translation.ko: 여기 온 그 순간 진 거라고

translation.en: Carter was dared to bring us here because this is where you can add new people to the game.
translation.ko: 누굴 게임에 끌어들일 땐 이곳으로 데려와야 하나 봐

translation.en: I have an idea.
Your turn's next. When you're asked, I need you to pick dare.
Why would I do that?
[Lucas, in distorted voice] Markie...
Truth or dare?
[sobbing] Now Lucas is asking me.
Pick dare.
But don't do it.
What? I'll die!
Markie,
I am so sorry for keeping that secret from you for so long.
translation.ko: 그 비밀을 오랫동안 숨겼던 거 미안해

translation.en: And I swear to you I will never ever keep anything from you again.
But we survive this only if we trust each other.
translation.ko: 우린 서로를 믿어야 살 수 있어

translation.en: Okay?
Okay.
Trust me.
[Lucas] You have to pick.
Dare.
I dare you to shoot Olivia.
He wants me to shoot you.
You gotta trust me, Markie. Don't do it.
This is the only way to save us both.
translation.ko: 그래야 둘 다 살 수 있어

translation.en: Okay.
I trust you.
I won't do it.
No!
Dare complete, Calux.
Your turn.
Truth or dare?
[in distorted voice] I'm not in this game.
No, once you're asked, you're in. Those are the rules, right?
So truth or dare, asshole?
Truth.
How do we get out of this game alive?
You can't.
Carter was the only one who could stop this.
So now the game won't end until all the players are dead.
translation.ko: 모든 플레이어가 죽을 때까지 이 게임은 안 끝나

translation.en: And your turn's next.
Unless you find some new friends to play with.
translation.ko: 같이 게임을 할 새 친구를 못 찾으면!

translation.en: But that's not gonna happen, is it?
[in normal voice] Your arm.
I'm okay.
Well, did it work?
It's not over.
The game will never end, not as long as we're alive.
translation.ko: 우리가 살아있는 한 게임은 안 끝나

translation.en: What are you doing?
I'm choosing you.
[Olivia on video] My friends and I went on a trip to Mexico for spring break.
translation.ko: 난 친구들과 봄방학 때 멕시코로 여행을 갔어요

translation.en: We ended up in an old mission where we played a game of truth or dare.
We had no idea that we had encountered an unspeakable evil
that wanted to play with us.
When we went home, the game kept going.
It killed five of my friends.
The game is real.
Tell the truth, do the dare, or you die.
Refuse to play, you die.
It can happen anywhere. And it can come from anyone.
I'm so sorry, but I have to ask you.
translation.ko: 미안하지만 당신한테 물을 수밖에 없어요 “게임의 저주”

translation.en: Truth or dare?
